name: Neck Tightening Cream, Neck Cream, Skin Tightening Cream For Fine lines, Loose & Sagging Skin On Face, Neck, Décolleté (3.4 Oz)
about_this_item: Visible Results: With regular use, this neck firming cream helps firming skin for a more youthful and revitalized appearance.
Firming: Our Neck Cream is specifically formulated to help firm skin, providing a youthful appearance.
Easy to Apply: The smooth and creamy formula of our skin firming cream for the face and neck is easy to apply and absorbs quickly into your skin.
Safe and Effective: Made with healthy ingredients, our neck cream is safe and effective, and free from formula additives.
Smooth and Hydrate: This neck firming cream is rich in nourishing ingredients that hydrate and smooth your skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple.

title: Smoothes wonderfully

title: Verified Purchase
content: I am of that certain age where products that say "Tightening Cream" gets my attention. I have tried other more expensive products and thought that I would try something new. I am happy that I did. I use it on my neck and upper chest and it visibly reduces the look of the lines. It isn't permanent but neither is going to the gym. I use it daily and notice a big difference. No scent to the lotion. Goes on smoothly and soaks in quickly.

title: Gets rid of fine lines and tightens loose skin
content: This cream works great! I love the creamy texture that feels so good going on. As it dries, you can feel it gently tightening. It doesn’t leave a residue and washes off. So far, it hasn’t irritated my skin at all and the scent is pleasant, but very mild.

title: Verified Purchase
